name: Arrow
caption:
Arrows used with small and long bows.
Unremarkable in any way, shape or form.

name: Fire Arrow
caption:
Arrow with the tip set alight.
Deals fire damage.

name: Serpent Arrow
caption:
Arrow carved to resemble a flying snake. Used in tandem with the Serpent Bow.

Loyal minions of the Formless Serpents, their fangs are daubed with deadly poison.

name: Bone Arrow (Fletched)
caption:
Arrow whittled from thin animal bones. Craftable item.

The feather fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

name: St. Trina's Arrow
caption:
Arrow carved to resemble a withered water lily. Afflicts targets with a powerful sleep effect.

Priests of St. Trina use these arrows to spread their teachings. The sweet oblivion of sleep can become quite the habit.

name: Shattershard Arrow (Fletched)
caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones tipped with a shard of crystal. Creates a resonating noise at the point of impact.

Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

name: Rainbow Stone Arrow (Fletched)
caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones tipped with chips of Rainbow Stone. Colored light shines at the point of impact.

Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

name: Golden Arrow
caption:
Carved arrows made in tandem with the Erdtree Bow. Deals holy damage.

Highly effective against Those Who Live in Death, and able to prevent them from rising again.

name: Dwelling Arrow
caption:
Arrow in which the spirits of small animals are thought to dwell. 
Deals magic damage.

Used by the master hunters of the ancestral followers.

name: Bone Arrow
caption:
Arrow whittled from thin animal bones. Craftable item.

Though the tip is certainly sharp, it does not fly particularly true.

name: Firebone Arrow (Fletched)
caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is set alight before firing. Deals fire damage.

Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

name: Firebone Arrow
caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is set alight before firing. Deals fire damage.

Craftable item.

name: Poisonbone Arrow (Fletched)
caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with venom. Afflicts targets with poison.

Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

name: Poisonbone Arrow
caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with venom. Afflicts targets with poison.

Craftable item.

name: Sleepbone Arrow (Fletched)
caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with a water lily tincture. Afflicts targets with sleep.

Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

name: Sleepbone Arrow
caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with a water lily tincture. Afflicts targets with sleep.

Craftable item.

name: Stormwing Bone Arrow
caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones fletched with stormhawk feathers. Craftable item.

Flies enshrouded in storm winds, breaking enemy stances and guards with ease.

name: Lightningbone Arrow (Fletched)
caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones with a lightning-infused tip. Deals lightning damage.

Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

name: Lightningbone Arrow
caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones with a lightning-infused tip. Deals lightning damage.

Craftable item.

name: Rainbow Stone Arrow
caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones tipped with chips of Rainbow Stone. Colored light shines at the point of impact.

Craftable item.

name: Shattershard Arrow
caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones tipped with a shard of crystal. Creates a resonating noise at the point of impact.

Craftable item.

name: Spiritflame Arrow
caption:
Arrow set alight with ghostflame before firing. Deals magic damage while also afflicting foes with frost.

Used by the Company of the Fallen Hawk, once ordered to explore the Eternal City.

name: Magicbone Arrow (Fletched)
caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with a glintstone tincture. Deals magic damage.

Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

name: Magicbone Arrow
caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with a glintstone tincture. Deals magic damage.

Craftable item.

name: Haligbone Arrow (Fletched)
caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with a golden tincture. Deals holy damage.

Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

name: Haligbone Arrow
caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with a golden tincture. Deals holy damage.

Craftable item.

name: Bloodbone Arrow (Fletched)
caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with a blood tincture. Afflicts targets with blood loss.

Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

name: Bloodbone Arrow
caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with a blood tincture. Afflicts targets with blood loss.

Craftable item.

name: Coldbone Arrow (Fletched)
caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones with a frozen tip. Afflicts targets with frost.

Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

name: Coldbone Arrow
caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones with a frozen tip. Afflicts targets with frost.

Craftable item.

name: Rotbone Arrow (Fletched)
caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with rot. Afflicts targets with scarlet rot.

Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

name: Rotbone Arrow
caption:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with rot. Afflicts targets with scarlet rot.

Craftable item.

name: Great Arrow
caption: A greatarrow as large as a spear for use with greatbows. Used by archers of monstrous strength employed by a lord's army.

name: Golem's Great Arrow
caption:
Greatarrow of black stone crafted by a civilization now gone to ruin. Used by the Guardian Golem.

This hefty arrow is enrobed in tempestuous winds, allowing it to break enemy stances and guards with ease.

name: Golden Great Arrow
caption:
Carved greatarrows made together with the Erdtree Greatbow. Deals holy damage.

Imbued with an oath-sworn incantation, which boosts the attack and defense of the archer and their nearby allies.

name: Golem's Magic Arrow
caption:
Greatarrow of black stone crafted by a civilization now gone to ruin. Imbued with its ancient magic.

Deals magic damage.

name: Radahn's Spear
caption:
Greatarrows used by General Radahn during the festival of combat. These are in fact the many spears with which he was stabbed by the Cleanrot Knights.

Imbued with Radahn's gravitational power.

name: Bone Great Arrow (Fletched)
caption:
Greatarrow as large as a spear whittled from stout animal bones.

Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

name: Bone Great Arrow
caption:
Greatarrow as large as a spear whittled from stout animal bones.

Though the tip is certainly sharp, it does not fly particularly true.

name: Bolt
caption:
Ammunition used for crossbows.
A widespread, common type of bolt.

name: Lightning Bolt
caption:
Bolt tipped with a shard of Gravel Stone. Deals powerful lightning damage.

Used by worshippers of the ancient dragons.

name: Perfumer's Bolt
caption:
Bolt created with perfumer techniques. Used by nobles' guards and the like.

The point of impact explodes with sparks, dealing fire damage.

name: Black-Key Bolt
caption:
Bolts used in Crepus' Black-Key Crossbow, an assassin's tool of exquisite craftsmanship.

The intricate spiral tip bores deep, injecting scarlet rot far into the flesh of its target.

name: Burred Bolt
caption:
Bolt covered in thorns. One of the most horrific weapons used in the Shattering. Afflicts target with blood loss.

Difficult to remove once buried in flesh, causing appalling damage to the body.

name: Meteor Bolt
caption:
Enchanted work of craft made in tandem with the Full Moon Crossbow. The tip is embedded with glintstone.

Like a shooting star, these bolts leave a beautiful trail when fired. Deals magic damage.

name: Explosive Bolt
caption: Bolt tipped with a shard of Explosive Stone. Explodes on impact, dealing fire damage.

name: Golden Bolt
caption:
Bolt blessed with an incantation of the Erdtree. Deals powerful holy damage.

Once used by guards of the Capital.

name: Lordsworn's Bolt
caption:
Well-crafted bolt with an illustrious design, wielded by regulars of a lord's army.

Deals more damage than its commonplace cousin.

name: Bone Bolt
caption:
Bolt carved from a thin animal bone. Craftable item.

Though the tip is certainly sharp, it does not fly particularly true.

name: Firebone Bolt
caption:
Bolt carved from animal bone. The tip is set alight before firing. Deals fire damage.

Craftable item.

name: Lightningbone Bolt
caption:
Bolt crafted from animal bone with a lightning-infused tip. Deals lightning damage.

Craftable item.

name: Magicbone Bolt
caption:
Bolt carved from animal bone. The tip is daubed with a glintstone tincture. Deals magic damage.

Craftable item.

name: Haligbone Bolt
caption:
Bolt carved from animal bone. The tip is daubed with a golden tincture. Deals holy damage.

Craftable item.

name: Poisonbone Bolt
caption:
Bolt carved from animal bone. The tip is daubed with venom. Afflicts targets with poison.

Craftable item.

name: Bloodbone Bolt
caption:
Bolt carved from animal bone. The tip is daubed with a blood tincture. Afflicts targets with blood loss.

Craftable item.

name: Coldbone Bolt
caption:
Bolt carved from animal bone with a frozen tip. Afflicts targets with frost.

Craftable item.

name: Rotbone Bolt
caption:
Bolt carved from animal bone. The tip is daubed with rot. Afflicts targets with scarlet rot.

Craftable item.

name: Sleepbone Bolt
caption:
Bolt carved from animal bone. The tip is daubed with a waterlily tincture. Afflicts targets with sleep.

Craftable item.

name: Flaming Bolt
caption:
Bolt with a fiercely burned tip. Deals powerful fire damage.

Used by survivors of Radahn's army to stave off the scarlet rot.

name: Ballista Bolt
caption: Greatbolt as large as a spear for use with Hand Ballista.

name: Lightning Greatbolt
caption:
Greatbolt tipped with a clump of Gravel Stone shards.

Deals powerful lightning damage.

name: Explosive Greatbolt
caption:
Greatbolt tipped with a clump of Explosive Stone shards.

Detonates a large explosion on impact, dealing fire damage.

name: Bone Ballista Bolt
caption:
Greatbolt as large as a spear carved from stout animal bones. Craftable item.

Though the tip is certainly sharp, it does not fly particularly true.
